Updated HiveMultiInputFormat to use BinaryWritable instead of ThriftWritable. This enables someone to easily implement a ProtobufSerDe in the future without requiring input format changes. Added javadoc and removed an unnecessary check.
Add HiveMultiInputFormat that wraps MultiInputFormat and gives ThriftWritable records. Update ThriftSerDe to use ThriftWritables.

Update DeprecatedInputFormatWrapper to handle FileSplit splits. This is necessary because Hive appears to generate splits without asking the input format (requires further investigation to understand why). Update ThriftSerDe to b64 decode and deserialize the thrift objects. This is necessary instead of using MultiInputFormat because the input format cannot have arguments in Hive. Instead, we simple use EB get lines from LZO compressed files, and deserialize in the serde.
